item.title: Contract Whale AguilaTrades' 40x BTC Long Position Liquidated Again, Resulting in a Total Loss of $39.8 Million
item.description: On August 1st, as monitored by Onchain lens, the BTC (40x) long position of contract whale AguilaTrades was partially liquidated once again. In this transaction so far, it has suffered a loss of $2.78 million.AguilaTrades is currently in an overall negative position of $39.8 million. It has deposited a total of $40.05 million USDC into the HyperLiquid account, and now only has $0.2 million remaining.

item.title: Pump.fun recently registered the subdomain fee.pump.fun.
item.description: On August 1st, based on market information, Pump.fun recently registered the subdomain fee.pump.fun, suggesting the impending launch of a fee dashboard or a transaction-based incentive scheme.

item.title: Yesterday REX-Osprey SOL Spot ETF saw a net inflow of $2.1 million
item.description: On August 1st, according to Farside Investors, the net inflow of REX-Osprey SOL Spot ETF yesterday was $2.1 million, and the cumulative net inflow since its listing has reached $137.4 million.

item.title: 「Insider Trader」 @qwatio opened a 40x short position on BTC and a 25x short position on ETH 5 hours ago, currently holding a unrealized profit of $1.9 million
item.description: August 1st. Based on the monitoring of on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, 5 hours ago, the "Insider Trader" @qwatio transferred 2.98 million USDC to Hyperliquid and opened short positions in BTC and ETH. Currently, there is a floating profit of $1.9 million.@qwatio used his principal for this short position. The profits from several previous contract operations have been almost completely liquidated. The funds transferred today are his last remaining principal. Currently, his position details are as follows:40 times short 1111 BTC, with a value of $128 million. The opening price is $117,297, and the liquidation price is $118,333.25 times short 4141 ETH, with a value of $15.28 million. The opening price is $3724, and the liquidation price is $4385.

item.title: US Stock Crypto Concept Stocks Experience Broad Decline, with VAPE Plummeting by 23.87% and COIN Dropping Over 9% in After-Hours Trading
item.description: On August 1st, according to rockflow data, the U.S. stock market closed on Thursday with all three major indexes experiencing a simultaneous decline. The Dow initially closed down by 0.74%, the S&P 500 dropped by 0.37%, and the Nasdaq Composite Index showed a slight decrease. Crypto-related stocks witnessed a general decline, including:Coinbase (COIN) fell by 9.23% after hours, with a trading volume of $4.711 billion.Circle (CRCL) decreased by 3.66% and then experienced an additional 2.46% drop after hours, with a trading volume of $1.074 billion.MicroStrategy (MSTR) rose by 1.73% and then fell by 1.58% after hours, with a trading volume of $4.237 billion.Galaxy Digital (GLXY) fell by 1.68% and then saw another 1.11% drop after hours, with a trading volume of $2.43 billion.MARA Holdings (MARA) fell by 2.84% and then had an additional 1.31% drop after hours, with a trading volume of $654 million.Riot Blockchain (RIOT) fell by 0.81% and then experienced a further 7.01% drop a

item.title: In the past 12 hours, the entire network has witnessed a total of $291 million in liquidations, with the majority coming from long positions.
item.description: On August 1st, according to Coinglass data, in the past 12 hours, a total of $291 million has been liquidated across the entire network. This affected 110,469 people globally. Specifically, long positions were liquidated to the tune of $272 million, while short positions were liquidated at $19.822 million. The largest single liquidation event took place on the Binance platform in the ETHUSDT contract trading pair, with a value of $6.8163 million.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Market Plunges Across the Board, Bitcoin Dips Below $116,000, Ethereum Below $3,700
item.description: On August 1st, according to HTX market data, perhaps due to the decline in US stock futures and the influence of Trump's revision of tariff rates for certain countries, the crypto market witnessed a widespread pullback. The details are as follows:Bitcoin is currently trading at $115,730, with a 24-hour decline of 1.75%.Ethereum is currently trading at $3,691, with a 24-hour decrease of 3.13%.SOL is currently trading at $171.46, with a 24-hour decrease of 3.64%.BIO is currently trading at $0.06, with a 24-hour decrease of 11.26%.REZ is currently trading at $0.01284, with a 24-hour decrease of 10.42%.1000CAT is currently trading at $0.00965, with a 24-hour decrease of 10.24%.CRV is currently trading at $0.9367, with a 24-hour decrease of 9.6%.

item.title: Trump Signs Executive Order, Amending Tariff Rates on Certain Countries
item.description: On August 1st, Trump issued an executive order to adjust the tariff rates on certain countries. The tariff on Canada was raised from 25% to 35%. The higher tariff will become effective on August 1, 2025. (Golden Finance)

item.title: Arkham: FTX/Alameda has Staked $1.25 Billion Worth of ETH and SOL
item.description: On August 1st, as per Arkham Monitoring, FTX/Alameda has placed a stake worth $1.25 billion in ETH and SOL.Last night, FTX's cold wallet staked $45 million worth of SOL, and Alameda's wallet address transferred $80 million worth of ETH into Figment.

item.title: SEC Chairman: Will Develop Framework to Allow for Trading of Crypto Securities and Traditional Securities Side by Side
item.description: On August 1st, the Chairman of the U.S. SEC, Atkins, stated that he has instructed the staff to conduct research on how to adjust the custody system in order to promote the development of the crypto asset custody business. At the same time, he directed the staff to develop a framework that enables the parallel trading of crypto securities and non-crypto securities. To facilitate the trading of tokenized securities, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission may need to consider amending the National Market System Rules. (FX168)
